name: Chicken Squash Spinach Tinola Soup
description: This Chicken Squash Spinach Tinola Soup is a perfect blend of high-protein and low-carb ingredients, ideal for anyone looking to enjoy a healthy, delicious meal with minimal sugar. Whether you're seeking a nourishing soup to warm you up or a healthy recipe to add to your collection, this Tinola variation is sure to delight.

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare ingredients: slice the chicken into bite-sized pieces, mince the garlic, chop the red onion, cut the pumpkin into 1" cubes, and finely slice the ginger.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pot over medium heat, saut√© garlic, onion, and ginger until aromatic, about 3-5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Add the chicken to the pot and cook until it turns white, approximately 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Pour in enough water to cover the chicken. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 20 minutes to create a flavorful broth.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Add the pumpkin cubes to the pot and simmer until tender, about 15 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Season the soup with salt and pepper to taste.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Add the spinach and simmer for an additional 2 minutes until the spinach is wilted.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot and enjoy your healthy and satisfying Chicken Squash Spinach Tinola Soup.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8
